thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Ryan M
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Ryan M

author: Ryan M
title: Ryan M
text: I've been using BangGood for a while now and they have become my favourite online shop. I buy a lot of my drone and bike parts from them and even though delivery can take 3 - 4 weeks, I am satisfied because the prices are well worth the wait. Their customer service teams are good too - never had any issues with the language and they are always quick to respond.
